name: tangling-hair

effect.sun-moon: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

short_effect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
